title: Teen wounded in Algiers shooting
content:
A teenager was shot in the foot in Algiers Monday night (Nov. 21), New Orleans police said.
The victim, 16, was near Mardi Gras and Nunez streets when he was approached by two men shortly before 6 p.m., police said. The pair opened fire on the teen, striking him in the foot. He was taken to a local hospital by private vehicle.
This story has been updated with additional information from police.
